A.description: service was in line with rider expectations of reliability, capacity, and quality.

B.description: service was usually good but occasionally fell short of rider expectations.

C.description: service met the needs of riders some of the time, but suffered from serious shortcomings and gaps. Focused action is required to improve service in the near-term.

D.description: service frequently failed to meet the needs of riders, and requires substantial effort at improvement.

F.description: service frequently failed to meet rider needs and expectations. Immediate action required to achieve minimum level of service.

N/A.description: no grade was available due to insufficient data on stop arrivals.
